text:
[Verse]
Under the moon so bright
Shadows dance in the light
Hearts beat in the night
Whispers take flight

[Verse 2]
Stars shining like dreams
Flowing along in streams
We’re just tiny beams
Lost in galaxies it seems

[Chorus]
We’ll find our way
Under the night so gray
Love's sweet array
We'll be okay

[Verse 3]
Echoes of our laughs
Moments slipping through glass
Time hurries so fast
Yet memories last

[Bridge]
In the silence we know
How the stars steal the show
Hearts glow like fireflies
In the moonlit skies

[Chorus]
We’ll find our way
Under the night so gray
Love's sweet array
We'll be okay
title: Under the Moon
